00018 //BibleTime includes
00019 #include <qstring.h>
00020 
00021 #include <stdlib.h>
00022 #include <stdio.h>
00023 
00024 #include "bt_gbfhtml.h"
00025 
00026 BT_GBFHTML::BT_GBFHTML(){
00027   setTokenStart("<");
00028     setTokenEnd(">");
00029     
00030     setTokenCaseSensitive(true);
00031 
00032     addTokenSubstitute("Rf", ")</small></font>");// end of footnote
00033     addTokenSubstitute("FI", "<i>"); // italics begin
00034     addTokenSubstitute("Fi", "</i>");
00035     addTokenSubstitute("FB", "<b>"); // bold begin
00036     addTokenSubstitute("Fb", "</b>");
00037     
00038     addTokenSubstitute("FR", QString::fromLatin1("<font color=\"%1\">").arg(jesuswords_color).latin1());        
00039     addTokenSubstitute("Fr", "</font>");
00040     addTokenSubstitute("FU", "<u>"); // underline begin
00041     addTokenSubstitute("Fu", "</u>");
00042     addTokenSubstitute("FO", "<cite>"); //  Old Testament quote begin
00043     addTokenSubstitute("Fo", "</cite>");
00044     addTokenSubstitute("FS", "<sup>"); // Superscript begin// Subscript begin
00045     addTokenSubstitute("Fs", "</sup>");
00046     addTokenSubstitute("FV", "<sub>"); // Subscript begin
00047     addTokenSubstitute("Fv", "</sub>");
00048 
00049     addTokenSubstitute("TT", QString::fromLatin1(" <h1><font color=\"%1\">").arg(text_color).local8Bit());
00050     addTokenSubstitute("Tt", "</font></h1>");
00051     
00052     addTokenSubstitute("Ts", "</font></h2>");
00053     addTokenSubstitute("TS", QString::fromLatin1(" <H2><font color=\"%1\">").arg(text_color).local8Bit());  
00054             
00055     addTokenSubstitute("PP", "<cite>"); //  poetry  begin
00056     addTokenSubstitute("Pp", "</cite>");
00057     addTokenSubstitute("Fn", "</font>"); //  font  end
00058     addTokenSubstitute("CL", "<br>"); //  new line
00059     addTokenSubstitute("CM", "<!p><br>"); //  paragraph <!P> is a non showing comment that can be changed in the front end to <P> if desired
00060     addTokenSubstitute("CG", ">"); // literal greater-than sign
00061     addTokenSubstitute("CT", "<"); // literal less-than sign
00062     addTokenSubstitute("JR", "<div align=\"right\">"); // right align begin
00063     addTokenSubstitute("JC", "<div align=\"center\">"); // center align begin
00064     addTokenSubstitute("JL", "</div>"); // align end
00065 }
00066 
00068 char BT_GBFHTML::ProcessText(char * text, int maxlen, const SWKey * key, const SWModule * module){
00069     BT_BASICFILTER::ProcessText(text, maxlen, key, module);
00070     BT_BASICFILTER::ProcessRWPRefs(text, maxlen);
00071 }
00072 
00073 
00074 bool BT_GBFHTML::handleToken(char **buf, const char *token, DualStringMap &userData) {
00075     if (!substituteToken(buf, token)) {  //more than a simple replace
00076     const int tokenLength = strlen(token);
00077         unsigned long i;
00078         unsigned long len = strlen(token);
00079 
00080         if (!strncmp(token, "WG", 2)){ // strong's numbers greek
00081             char num[6];
00082             for (i = 2; i < tokenLength; i++)
00083                     num[i-2] = token[i];
00084             num[i-2]=0;
00085 
00086             pushString(buf," <font color=\"%s\"><small><em><a href=\"strongs://Greek/%s\">&lt;%s&gt;</a></em></small></font> ",
00087                 strongs_color, num, num);
00088         }
00089 
00090         if (!strncmp(token, "WH", 2)){ // strong's numbers hebrew
00091             char num[6];
00092             for (i = 2; i < tokenLength; i++)
00093                     num[i-2] = token[i];
00094             num[i-2]=0;
00095 
00096             pushString(buf," <font color=\"%s\"><small><em><a href=\"strongs://Hebrew/%s\">&lt;%s&gt;</a></em></small></font> ",
00097                 strongs_color, num, num);
00098         }
00099 
00100         else if (!strncmp(token, "WTG", 3)) { // strong's numbers tense greek
00101             char num[16];
00102             for (i = 3; i < tokenLength; i++)
00103                     num[i-3] = token[i];
00104             num[i-3]=0;
00105 
00106             pushString(buf," <font color=\"%s\"><small><em><a href=\"morph://Greek/%s\">(%s)</a></em></small></font> ",
00107                 strongs_color, num, num);
00108         }
00109 
00110         else if (!strncmp(token, "WTH", 3)) { // strong's numbers tense hebrew
00111 
00112             char num[6];
00113             for (i = 3; i < tokenLength; i++)
00114                     num[i-3] = token[i];
00115             num[i-3]=0;
00116 
00117             pushString(buf," <font color=\"%s\"><small><em><a href=\"morph://Hebrew/%s\">(%s)</a></em></small></font> ",
00118                 strongs_color, num, num);
00119         }
00120 
00121         else if (!strncmp(token, "RB", 2)) {
00122             pushString(buf, "<i>");
00123             userData["hasFootnotePreTag"] = "true";
00124         }
00125 
00126         else if (!strncmp(token, "RF", 2)) {
00127             if(userData["hasFootnotePreTag"] == "true") {
00128                 userData["hasFootnotePreTag"] = "false";
00129                 pushString(buf, "</i> ");
00130             }
00131             pushString(buf,"<font color=\"%s\"><small> (",footnote_color);
00132         }
00133 
00134         else if (!strncmp(token, "FN", 2)) {
00135             pushString(buf, "<font face=\"");
00136             for (i = 2; i < tokenLength; i++)               
00137                 if(token[i] != '\"')
00138                     *(*buf)++ = token[i];
00139             pushString(buf,"\">");
00140         }
00141         else if (!strncmp(token, "CA", 2)) {    // ASCII value
00142             *(*buf)++ = (char)atoi(&token[2]);
00143         }       
00144         else {
00145             return false;
00146         }
00147     }
00148     return true;
00149 }
00150 
00152 void BT_GBFHTML::updateTokens(){
00153     replaceTokenSubstitute("TT", QString::fromLatin1(" <h1><font color=\"%1\">").arg(text_color).local8Bit());
00154     replaceTokenSubstitute("TS", QString::fromLatin1(" <H2><font color=\"%1\">").arg(text_color).local8Bit());
00155     replaceTokenSubstitute("FR", QString::fromLatin1("<font color=\"%1\">").arg(jesuswords_color).latin1());    
00156 }
